language.description: Determines which set of words are used, from International Matrix Tests doc. Unused if 'rows' property is specified.

autoSubmit.description: Go straight to next page when a choice is selected

correct.description: The correct answer, such as 'Alan bought some big beds'. Should have the same number of words as there are columns in the word matrix.

feedback.description: Provide feedback after submit.  'gradeResponse' will mark answers correct/incorrect(green/red).  'showCorrect' will grade AND show the correct choices.
